name: project-starter
description: Start Flutter frontend and Python backend simultaneously

scripts.build: concurrently "flutter build web" "cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd frontend && flutter run -d windows " "cd backend/python && uvicorn kisametintesti:app && uvicorn fastapi_spiral_app.py --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000 --reload"
